text: Lelo Daudi nakawalonjela vilongozi wa heye wawele Yelusalemu hamwe na heye, “Tuche hano! Twanguganigwa kulawa himahima sambi baha ama kuduhu ne yumwe yosulupuka kulawa kwa Abusalomu. Wone hatulawa himahima, kotibata hetwe tung'hali baha. Hamba kotukopola tweng'ha na chila yumwe aha kuli muji.”
